description: Total Outlook Converter is a professional tool to convert Outlook emails to PDF, TXT, TIFF, DOC, HTML.  Total Outlook Converter is very flexible. You select the fields that are included into the resulting file (subject, body, sender, recipient, date, etc.) Emails are converted in batch saving your time and effort. Attachments can be placed in a separate folder.
summary: Convert Outlook emails to PDF, TXT, TIFF, DOC, HTML via GUI or command line.
author: CoolUtils
